{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Edgewater Networks EdgeMarc 4700.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = EdgeMarc 4700 Enterprise Session Border Controller |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Edgewater_Networks_EdgeMarc_4700 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Edgewater Networks |model = EdgeMarc 4700 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Freescale;P1020E; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = PowerPC |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 800 <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Intel;JS28F512M29EWH; |flash1size = 64 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B2G1646Q-BCK0; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211DS; |eth3chip = Realtek;RTL8211DS; |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8370M; |wan_ports = 2 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 8 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 54:39:68
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2013.01;V1.1.0; |stockos = Linux;3.8.13;-rt9;
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.33 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, console port,, DE-9,, (9600 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 16-pin header,, unpopulated,, JP2
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = SD/SDHC/MMC Card slot, heat sink, metal case, |addchip = I2C Real Time Clock;Intersil;ISL12026;;1;,,, PCI Express Clock;Pericom;PI6C557-05;;1;,,, 4Kb I2C Serial EEPROM;On Semi;CAV24C04;;1;,,, 2 Channel RS232 Interface;Analog Devices;ADM3202;;1;,,, 16-bit D-type Transparent Latch w/ 3-State Input/Output;NXP;74LVC16373A;;1;,,, Digital DC/DC Controller w/ Auto Compensation;Intersil;ZL6105;;1;,,, <!-- Digital DC/DC Controller with Drivers;Zilker;ZL6105;;1;,,, --> 30V N-Channel Power MOSFET;Infineon;BSC020N03MS;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel Power MOSFET;Infineon;BSC080N03MS;;1;,,, 3-State Octal Buffer/Line Driver;NXP;LVC244A;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = default |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 04/2015 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00VO82KSW |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Links of Interest== *[ftp://ftp.edgewaternetworks.com/pub/docs/EdgeMarc/4700/EM4700_HIG.pdf Hardware Installation Guide]
